General.Name: Jiangsu Hualv Biological Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Hualv Biological Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of edible fungi in China. It offers Flammulina velutipes, and Shinji mushrooms, including white jade and crab-flavored mushrooms; and maitake, velvet, and other edible mushrooms. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Suqian, China.
